title: Darn Warm Anti-Smell Alpaca Socks - Best Natural Solution for Cold Feet - Perfect for Outdoor Activities
features: [ For Men And Women ] **New Model without Light Grey mesh on Top/Instep** [ New batch of socks (December 2020 up to today) may come with our eco-friendly cardstock labels not attached with a plastic tag fastener as it may hurt the socks ] Women, please order one size down from your normal size. Men, please order your regular size. Alpaca fiber is naturally soft, caring, and protective.

[ Comfort for Your Preferred Outdoor Activities ] Terry-lined and cushioned all the way up, cushioning keeps working to the end of the day. Alpaca guarantees comfort [ Never Too Warm Or Cold, Even When Damp ] Worry-Free [ Comfort Guaranteed ] for all outdoor activities: Trekking, Hiking, Hunting and Fishing.

[ Natural Smart Warmth With Extra Caring Softness ] Alpaca holds inside the fibers tiny pockets of air that provide the [ World's Best Natural Thermal Management ] in cold and warm environments: Alpaca can be three times as warm as wool but will not overheat and will keep you at the right temperature even when damp. Alpaca has [ Best Natural Wicking Capabilities ] Aloe infused for extra comfort, softness, and will help with blisters.

[ Not Itchy - Wool Free ] soft and without lanolin. [ AndeanSun True Alpaca Pledge ] We always clearly and accurately disclose the composition of our products: 50% Alpaca - 35% High-Quality, Soft Acrylic - 8% Spandex - 5% Elastic - 2% Nylon, a proven blend that extends the life of the socks and enhances natural alpaca properties. Made with love and with you in mind in Peru, South America, alpaca's home land.

[ Freshness, Easy Care & Cleaning ] Machine wash in [ Cool ] gentle cycle (washing them in cool water and hand wash setting gets great results!). Air dry lay flat (on top of dryer works great) or on a drying rack. Tumble drying can be used in [ Air Fluff/No Heat ] setting but avoiding it will increase longevity. Heat and agitation make soft fibers to pill, do not use heat. Due to the nature of alpaca, these socks stay fresh and comfortable longer than usual.
description: Our Outdoor Socks bring you the best Comfort for Your Preferred Outdoor Activities. They are terry-lined and cushioned all the way up; cushioning keeps working to the end of the day. Alpaca guarantees comfort [ Never Too Warm Or Cold ] Even when damp. Worry-Free [ Comfort Guaranteed ] For all outdoor activities: Trekking, Hiking, Hunting, Fishing. Enjoy Natural Smart Warmth and Extra Caring Softness. Alpaca holds inside the fibers tiny pockets of air that provide the [ World's Best Natural Thermal Management ] in cold and warm environments. Alpaca can be three times as warm as wool but will not overheat and will keep you at the right temperature even wet. Alpaca has the Best Natural Wicking Capabilities and the Best Natural Odor Neutralizing Properties. Aloe infused for extra comfort, softness, and skincare and blister prevention.
